title: EIU Democracy Index 2024 Reports Historic Low in Global Democracy Score
summary: The Economist Intelligence Unit releases its 2024 Democracy Index showing the global democracy score hitting a historic low of 5.17 (on a 0-10 scale), down from 5.23 in 2023. The report shows 130 countries of 167 total either declined or made no improvement, with 39.2% of the world population now living under authoritarian rule. France and South Korea were notably downgraded from "full" to "flawed" democracies.
